description: A malison is a hideous blend of human and serpentine features. Three different types of malisons are known to exist, and other types are possible. Malisons form the middle caste of yuan-ti society and hunewith arrows tipped with their own venom. They use their magical powers of suggestion to force their enemies' surrender.
name: Yuan-ti Malison
